items.name: Workflow Auto-Config on Creation
items.description: Auto-set error workflow, register webhooks, enable MCP on new workflows.
items.business_impact: Zero-touch setup. Every new workflow starts correctly configured.

items.name: Weekly Workflow Changelog
items.description: Weekly snapshot of workflow changes — what was created, modified, activated.
items.business_impact: Team visibility into what changed without digging through n8n.

items.name: Auto Use Case Generator
items.description: Generate use case docs automatically when workflows activate.
items.business_impact: Documentation that writes itself. No more outdated wikis.

items.name: Self-Healer Heartbeat Monitor
items.description: Monitor self-healer health. Alert if the thing that fixes things breaks.
items.business_impact: Who watches the watchmen? This does.

items.name: Fathom Webhook Reliability
items.description: Ensure call data capture is consistent and no recordings are missed.
items.business_impact: Bad data in = bad intelligence out. This ensures the call pipeline is solid.

items.name: Data Integrity Checks
items.description: Validate upstream data inputs across Planhat, Airtable, Intercom.
items.business_impact: Catches data quality issues before they corrupt downstream workflows.

items.name: Client Silence Detection
items.description: Detect clients going quiet across channels — no calls, no tickets, no engagement.
items.business_impact: Strongest leading indicator of churn. Silent clients have mentally moved on.

items.name: Execution Audit Trail
items.description: Track workflow execution history, outcomes, and error patterns.
items.business_impact: Prove what your automation stack is doing. Critical for exec buy-in.

items.name: Signal Velocity Tracking
items.description: Transform point-in-time snapshots into trend data. Week-over-week deltas.
items.business_impact: Snapshots are useless. Velocity tells you direction. Rising or falling matters more than the number.

items.name: Voice AI Adoption Tracking
items.description: Track Voice AI feature adoption % across all clients.
items.business_impact: Product usage depth. Low adoption = eventual churn regardless of sentiment.

items.name: Wrike Implementation Velocity
items.description: Subtask completion metrics, kickoff detection, blocker attribution from Wrike.
items.business_impact: Implementation velocity is the leading indicator for transformation success.

items.name: Maturity Model V1 — Stage Tracking
items.description: 1-to-1 → Dispatch → Distributed classification. Regression flagging. Committee transitions.
items.business_impact: The strategic framework that contextualizes everything else.

items.name: MCP Auto-Config Bulk Fix
items.description: Bulk-fixed 36 workflows with correct merge settings.
items.business_impact: Prevents config drift. One-time cleanup that prevents ongoing issues.

items.name: Intercom Intelligence Weekly Digest
items.description: Pulls closed Intercom conversations, Claude extracts themes (bugs, requests, billing, complaints). Per-company aggregation + exec digest.
items.business_impact: Turns the support firehose into structured per-client intelligence. Exec visibility without reading every ticket.

items.name: Workflow Optimizer v2 — Proactive Quality
items.description: Daily scan of all workflows against documented standards. Logs issues to Airtable, auto-fixes safe config violations (timeout, errorWorkflow, timezone).
items.business_impact: Prevents technical debt. Encoded standards enforcement. Team learns from Suggestion field. Auto-fixes 5 workflows on day 1.

items.name: Support Volume Trajectory
items.description: Per-client Intercom volume over time. Identifies lifecycle patterns: high during onboarding → stable → spike = trouble.
items.business_impact: Temporal patterns invisible in Intercom. A spike after stability means something changed.

items.name: Maturity Model V2 — Call Intelligence
items.description: AI evaluates call transcripts against maturity model stage and exit requirements. Transformation momentum assessment.
items.business_impact: Connects qualitative calls to quantitative maturity tracking. Richest signal for whether a client is transforming.

items.name: Health Scoring Rubric Design
items.description: Define composite health score: signals, weights, thresholds. Document scoring methodology.
items.business_impact: Can't automate health scoring without agreeing what health means. Design before build.

items.name: Health Scoring Agent
items.description: Automated composite health scores: Intercom patterns, call sentiment, adoption, silence, Wrike velocity, maturity stage.
items.business_impact: The synthesis layer. Combines all signals into one actionable score per client. The whole stack builds toward this.

items.name: Client Briefing Generator
items.description: Pre-meeting context summaries: last 7 days of calls, tickets, adoption changes, health movement, milestones.
items.business_impact: Changes CSM prep from 30 min to 2 min. Intelligence comes to the CSM.

items.name: Weekly Account Brief for CSMs
items.description: Every Monday, per-CSM: 7-day summaries, sentiment, adoption changes, open tickets. Claude generates briefing.
items.business_impact: Story comes to CSMs. No more hunting.

items.name: Call Intelligence — Blocker Detection
items.description: AI identifies transformation blockers from transcripts: technical issues, change resistance, resource constraints.
items.business_impact: Connects calls to blockers. Identifies patterns across clients with similar obstacles.

items.name: Semi-Auto Error Fixing
items.description: Error handler triggers paste-ready error context to Slack. Human reviews, approves fix.
items.business_impact: Quick win. Reduces manual debugging time.

items.name: Impact Tracker
items.description: Tracks whether automated outputs drive action: completion rates, time-to-action, CSM engagement with summaries.
items.business_impact: Prove automation value. Critical for exec buy-in.

items.name: Override & Feedback Mechanism
items.description: Disagree buttons on automated assessments. CSMs challenge with reasons. Feedback stored.
items.business_impact: Without this, CSMs either blindly follow or ignore. Feedback loop improves accuracy.

items.name: Feature Request → ARR Weighting
items.description: Extracts feature requests from Intercom/Jira, matches to client ARR. Revenue-weighted leaderboard.
items.business_impact: "These requests represent $1.2M in renewal risk." Product gets revenue-prioritized backlog.

items.name: Closing the Loop — External
items.description: Client-facing closed-loop workflow: issue reported → tracked → resolved → client notified. Automated follow-through visibility.
items.business_impact: Clients see DashQ closing loops without being asked. Builds trust, reduces "did you forget about this?" follow-ups. Operationalizes the internal Closing the Loop workflow externally.
items.dependencies: Intercom Intelligence (#14); Planhat; Closing the Loop internal

items.name: Full-Auto Error Fixing
items.description: Claude Code auto-fixes broken workflows overnight. Error → diagnosis → fix → test → redeploy.
items.business_impact: Autonomous loop. Claude fixes its own workflows while you sleep.

items.name: CSM Coaching Insights
items.description: AI evaluates CSM call performance against best practices. Private feedback to manager.
items.business_impact: Scales coaching without requiring manager on every call.

items.name: Playbook Trigger Engine
items.description: Specific signal combinations auto-trigger specific playbooks. "If health drops below X and silence > Y, trigger save play."
items.business_impact: Moves from "here's what happened" to "here's what to do." Prescriptive, not descriptive.

items.name: QBR Auto-Generator
items.description: Pulls all client data into pre-built QBR deck. CSM reviews and customizes.
items.business_impact: QBR prep from hours to minutes. Data is always fresh.

items.name: Renewal Risk Scoring
items.description: Predict renewal risk from composite signals. Time-weighted model favoring recent trends.
items.business_impact: The question every CS leader asks: "Who's going to churn?" Answered with data.

items.name: Expansion Opportunity Detection
items.description: Identify upsell signals: high adoption, positive sentiment, usage ceiling, contract approaching.
items.business_impact: Revenue growth from existing clients. The 125% NRR driver.

items.name: Pre-Call Briefing Agent
items.description: Auto-briefing before every CS call. Full account context + recommended talk track.
items.business_impact: CSM walks into every call prepared. Zero prep time.

items.name: Calendar/Meeting Trigger
items.description: Detect upcoming calls, trigger briefings and context assembly automatically.
items.business_impact: The plumbing that makes pre-call briefings automatic.

items.name: Knowledge Base Auto-Updater
items.description: Intercom Intelligence feeds into knowledge base updates. Recurring themes → new articles.
items.business_impact: KB that updates itself based on what clients actually ask about.

items.name: Client Communication Analyzer
items.description: Sentiment tracking across all touchpoints. Longitudinal communication health per client.
items.business_impact: Unified sentiment trajectory. Not just calls — emails, tickets, everything.

items.name: Multi-Tenant Benchmarking
items.description: Cross-client performance comparisons. Anonymized benchmarks vs. peers.
items.business_impact: Clients love knowing how they compare. Creates urgency for underperformers.

items.name: Predictive Churn Model
items.description: ML-based churn prediction from historical data. Train on actual churn events.
items.business_impact: The holy grail. Requires enough historical data to train reliably.

items.name: Autonomous CS Agent
items.description: End-to-end autonomous CS: detect risk → select playbook → execute → measure → learn.
items.business_impact: The fully autonomous loop. Fire yourself vision culminated.

items.name: Revenue Impact Calculator
items.description: Quantify automation ROI: time saved, churn prevented, expansion captured.
items.business_impact: Executive-level proof. Translates ops metrics into revenue language.

items.name: Workflow Self-Optimization
items.description: Workflows tune their own parameters from outcome data. Adjust thresholds, timing, logic.
items.business_impact: The automation stack that improves itself.

items.name: Cross-System Data Reconciliation
items.description: Ensure data consistency across Planhat, Airtable, Intercom. Detect and resolve discrepancies.
items.business_impact: Data drift undermines trust in all intelligence.

items.name: Maturity Model V3 — Distributed
items.description: Full Distributed stage tracking with exit criteria automation.
items.business_impact: Completes the maturity model. Distributed is hardest to measure, most valuable to achieve.

items.name: Notebook LLM Onboarding
items.description: Use Notebook LLM to build better onboarding docs for team at scale.
items.business_impact: Scales team onboarding without rewriting docs manually.

items.name: Planhat-Intercom Sync V2
items.description: Batch processing (8 companies/run) or incremental sync for clean execution.
items.business_impact: Current sync crashes from memory limits. Works but ugly.

items.name: Wrike-Planhat Sync
items.description: Implementation status from Wrike synced to Planhat fields.
items.business_impact: Single pane of glass. Implementation progress visible in Planhat.

items.name: Production Quality Gate with Triple-Layer Defense
items.description: Comprehensive testing system with 65 tests (92% coverage), pre-push hooks, GitHub Actions CI/CD, and browser validation. Prevents bugs from reaching production through automated validation.
items.business_impact: Eliminates production bugs, saves 100+ hours annually in debugging and hotfixes
items.outcome: 65/65 tests passing, zero bugs shipped since deployment, 92% code coverage
items.success_metric: Zero production bugs, all pushes validated, 100% test pass rate

items.name: Claude Code Self-Validation (Pre-Commit)
items.description: AI validates its own work before committing. Runs 6 check categories in 1 second: Python syntax, data integrity, static assets, security, CSP config, backend imports.
items.business_impact: First layer of defense, catches bugs before commit, saves iteration time
items.outcome: 1-second validation, catches 6 bug types before commit
items.success_metric: All commits validated, zero bugs reach pre-push hook

items.name: Self-Managing Roadmap System
items.description: Claude Code automatically updates roadmap items when building features. Search items, mark IN_PROGRESS, mark DONE with notes, track edit history. The roadmap manages itself.
items.business_impact: Self-documenting system, zero manual roadmap updates, automatic progress tracking
items.outcome: Roadmap updates automatically, confetti fires on completion, edit history tracked
items.success_metric: Zero manual roadmap updates needed, 100% feature tracking accuracy

items.name: Production System Documentation Package
items.description: Executive brief, technical architecture, case study, metrics dashboard, presentation deck. Documents Phases 1-2.5 quality gate + roadmap system.
items.business_impact: Communicates value to leadership, enables knowledge sharing, supports scaling

items.name: User Authentication & Multi-User Support
items.description: Login system, user roles (admin/editor/viewer), session management with Flask-Login. Enables team collaboration on roadmap.
items.business_impact: Enables team collaboration, tracks individual contributions, secures dashboard
items.outcome: Built Flask-Login auth with admin/editor/viewer roles, session management, login/logout/me endpoints, 10 auth tests passing

edit_history.new_value: Built Flask-Login auth with admin/editor/viewer roles, session management, login/logout/me endpoints, 10 auth tests passing

items.name: Activate Voting Endpoint (Stub to Live)
items.description: Implement POST /api/roadmap/items/:id/vote endpoint. Upvote/downvote items, vote counts on cards, one vote per user. Voting stub already exists in API.
items.business_impact: Democratic prioritization, team engagement, visible stakeholder input
items.outcome: Replaced 501 stub with full upvote/downvote toggle, one vote per user, vote_count tracking, 9 voting tests passing

edit_history.new_value: Replaced 501 stub with full upvote/downvote toggle, one vote per user, vote_count tracking, 9 voting tests passing

items.name: Comment Threads on Roadmap Items
items.description: Discussion threads in detail modal, reply to comments, @mentions, edit/delete own comments. Enables async collaboration.
items.business_impact: Captures context, reduces Slack noise, preserves decision history
items.outcome: Full CRUD comments with owner/admin permissions, 5000 char limit, edit history tracking, comments preserved through updates, 13 comment tests passing

edit_history.new_value: Full CRUD comments with owner/admin permissions, 5000 char limit, edit history tracking, comments preserved through updates, 13 comment tests passing

items.name: Add Items from Chat ("add to roadmap" trigger)
items.description: When user says "add this to roadmap" in Claude browser, automatically creates roadmap item in BACKLOG with extracted details.
items.business_impact: Never forget ideas from conversations, conversational roadmap management

items.name: Auto-Create Items from Customer Calls/Emails
items.description: Extract feature requests from Fathom calls, Intercom conversations, Slack messages. AI creates roadmap items tagged with customer source, urgency, and frequency.
items.business_impact: Customer-driven roadmap, captures voice of customer, prioritizes by demand

items.name: Points, Leaderboard, Badges & Streaks
items.description: Points system for completing items, contributor leaderboard, achievement badges (10/50/100 items), consecutive day streaks, velocity charts.
items.business_impact: Increases engagement, celebrates wins, visible progress metrics

items.name: Upload Files to Roadmap Cards
items.description: Attach documents, images, links to items. Display attachments in detail modal with preview. Support drag-drop upload.
items.business_impact: Rich context, reduces external tool dependencies, centralizes documentation

items.name: Multi-Select & Bulk Edit
items.description: Select multiple cards, bulk status change, bulk tag assignment, bulk delete. Checkbox selection with keyboard shortcuts.
items.business_impact: Faster roadmap management, efficient reorganization, time savings

items.name: Direct API Integration for Conversational Roadmap Management
items.description: Add /api/roadmap/items/create endpoint with API key auth. Enables Claude Browser to create roadmap items directly from conversation without switching to Claude Code. User says 'add to roadmap' and item is created instantly.
items.business_impact: Eliminates context switching, enables conversational roadmap management, reduces friction from 5 steps to 1
items.outcome: Built secure REST API endpoint at /api/roadmap/items/create with API key authentication. 6 new tests (71 total). Enables Claude Browser to create roadmap items directly from conversation.
items.success_metric: Zero manual item creation, all items added via conversation

edit_history.new_value: Built secure REST API endpoint at /api/roadmap/items/create with API key authentication. 6 new tests (71 total). Enables Claude Browser to create roadmap items directly from conversation.

items.name: User Analytics & Adoption Tracking
items.description: Track user logins, session duration, feature usage, and adoption metrics over time. Dashboard showing daily/weekly/monthly active users, login frequency, most-used features, and engagement trends.
items.business_impact: Measure team adoption, identify power users, track feature engagement, validate roadmap prioritization decisions, report usage to leadership
items.success_metric: Can see daily/weekly/monthly active users, login frequency per user, feature usage heatmap, adoption trend over time
